name: AppsFlyer Pull API
description: Raw event-level data from AppsFlyer Pull API v5. Contains two separate file schemas: Installs Report (attribution & install-level data) and In-App Events Report (post-install events, revenue, actions).

schema.name: installs_report
schema.description: Raw install-level data from AppsFlyer Installs Report API (v5). One row per install event. Primary source for attribution and cohort creation.

properties.name: attributed_touch_type
properties.description: Classifies the engagement. Set by AppsFlyer after the engagement was matched with an install.

properties.name: attributed_touch_time
properties.description: UA: time of the touch we attributed to. Retargeting: time of the engagement we attributed to.

properties.name: install_time
properties.description: UA: First launch after install. Retargeting: First launch after re-engagement/re-attribution

properties.name: event_time
properties.description: Time the event occurred

properties.name: event_name
properties.description: The attribution event type or the in-app event name sent by the app. Example attribution event types: install, re-engagement, and so on.

properties.name: af_prt
properties.description: Agency identifier. For SKAN, may not be populated

properties.name: media_source
properties.description: The media source attributed to an event or restricted

properties.name: af_channel
properties.description: Media source channel. Example: YouTube for Google, Instagram for Meta ads

properties.name: keywords
properties.description: Word(s) used in the user's online search. As reported by the ad network

properties.name: af_c_id
properties.description: Campaign ID

properties.name: af_adset
properties.description: Adset name, identifies a group that contains one or more ads

properties.name: af_adset_id
properties.description: Adset ID, identifies a group that contains one or more ads

properties.name: af_ad
properties.description: Ad name

properties.name: af_ad_id
properties.description: Ad ID

properties.name: af_ad_type
properties.description: Example: banner, footer

properties.name: af_siteid
properties.description: Publisher ID

properties.name: af_sub_siteid
properties.description: Sub-publisher ID

properties.name: af_cost_model
properties.description: Cost model reported on the attribution link. CPC/CPI/CPM/Other. Currently, all cost is calculated according to CPI regardless of this value

properties.name: af_cost_value
properties.description: Amount of Cost Currency. 4 digits after the decimal point permitted. Example: 320.5095

properties.name: af_cost_currency
properties.description: 3-letter currency code (USD, EUR) that complies with ISO-4217. Default is USD.

properties.name: contributor1_af_prt
properties.description: Agency or PMD - always converted to lowercase

properties.name: contributor1_media_source
properties.description: Contributor media source

properties.name: contributor1_campaign
properties.description: Contributor campaign

properties.name: contributor1_touch_type
properties.description: Possible values: click, impression

properties.name: contributor1_touch_time
properties.description: Contributor touch time

properties.name: contributor2_af_prt
properties.description: Agency or PMD - always converted to lowercase

properties.name: contributor2_media_source
properties.description: Contributor media source

properties.name: contributor2_campaign
properties.description: Contributor campaign

properties.name: contributor2_touch_type
properties.description: Possible values: click, impression

properties.name: contributor2_touch_time
properties.description: Contributor touch time

properties.name: contributor3_af_prt
properties.description: Agency or PMD - always converted to lowercase

properties.name: contributor3_media_source
properties.description: Contributor media source

properties.name: contributor3_campaign
properties.description: Contributor campaign

properties.name: contributor3_touch_type
properties.description: Possible values: click, impression

properties.name: contributor3_touch_time
properties.description: Contributor touch time

properties.name: region
properties.description: Using the device IP address reported by the SDK. For SKAN, determined according to the country_code

properties.name: country_code
properties.description: Country Code using ISO 3166 (alpha-2). Example: US, CN. The United Kingdom code implemented is UK, not GB.

properties.name: state
properties.description: Using the device IP address reported by the SDK

properties.name: city
properties.description: The most granular location of the user based on the device IP. Usually, the value holds a city name, but it can also be districts, boroughs, etc., which are more accurate.

properties.name: postal_code
properties.description: Using the device IP address reported by the SDK. For SKAN, starting August 30, 2021, always null

properties.name: dma
properties.description: Designated Market Area or geographic areas. Defined by the Nielsen company. Determining user location.

properties.name: ip
properties.description: IP address being IPV4 or IPV6. AppsFlyer uses the address to determine the user location. If needed, advertisers can mask the IP address from reports and postbacks.

properties.name: wifi
properties.description: Set to either TRUE or FALSE

properties.name: operator
properties.description: The name of the mobile operator derived from the SIM MCCMNC. Available if the user is registered to the network using Android getNetworkOperatorName()

properties.name: carrier
properties.description: The carrier name provided by Android using getSimCarrierIdName(). See also carrier mapping

properties.name: language
properties.description: Language (locale) reported by the device and set by the device OS. Usually has the form ll-DD. Where ll is the language and DD is the dialect. For example, en-ZA means English as used in South Africa.

properties.name: appsflyer_id
properties.description: A unique ID generated by the SDK when the app is installed on a device. The ID is used to attribute in-app events in LTV flows, fetch conversion data, and affiliate in-app events. A new ID is generated if the app is deleted and installed again. Restoring the app from an iCloud backup is not regarded as an install. For CTV, this field is populated with the custom_device_id (the device ID managed by the advertiser).

properties.name: advertising_id
properties.description: User-resettable device ID, AKA GAID. For CTV this is the CTV ID, for example RIDA or VIDA.

properties.name: idfa
properties.description: User resettable advertising ID found on iOS devices. If IDFA is not available it's typically populated with Zeros.

properties.name: android_id
properties.description: Permanent device ID

properties.name: customer_user_id
properties.description: A unique app user ID, set by the app owner. Only available in advanced reports.

properties.name: imei
properties.description: Permanent device ID

properties.name: idfv
properties.description: Vendor ID provided by iOS

properties.name: platform
properties.description: Device platform: android, ios, windowsphone, smartcast, tizen, roku, webos, vidaa, playstation, xbox, switch, steam, epic, nativepc, quest

properties.name: os_version
properties.description: Device operating system version

properties.name: app_version
properties.description: Set by the advertiser

properties.name: sdk_version
properties.description: AppsFlyer SDK version

properties.name: app_id
properties.description: Unique app identifier in Appsflyer. Example: iOS: id123456789 Android: com.appsflyer.referrersender

properties.name: app_name
properties.description: Set by the advertiser

properties.name: bundle_id
properties.description: iOS: Identification to match either a single app or a group of apps in iOS (See Apple developer bundle ID). Android: App ID. Note: This field is not related to AppsFlyer PBA.

properties.name: is_retargeting
properties.description: UA: False. Retargeting: True for retargeting conversions and events

properties.name: retargeting_conversion_type
properties.description: UA: Re-install. Re-targeting: Re-engagement, Re-attribution

properties.name: af_attribution_lookback
properties.description: Maximum period of time when an install can be attributed to a specific ad. UA: For click attribution, set on the af_click_lookback attribution link parameter. Retargeting: Set in app settings for Retargeting click-through lookback.

properties.name: af_reengagement_window
properties.description: Retargeting: The time period during which events are attributed to a retargeting campaign. Note: The field is not populated in retargeting campaigns.

properties.name: is_primary_attribution
properties.description: UA: True. Retargeting: During a re-engagement window, we attribute to both the original media source (before the re-engagement) and to the re-engagement media source. While the event is within the re-engagement window. The original media source will be FALSE (not primary attribution). The re-engagement media source will be TRUE.

properties.name: user_agent
properties.description: The URL/device user agent

properties.name: http_referrer
properties.description: Identifies the address of the webpage that linked to the AppsFlyer click URL. By checking the referrer, you can see where the request originated.

properties.name: original_url
properties.description: UA: Click/impression URL used. If the link is a Branded Link: the field is populated using the branded link. Retargeting: contains one of the following: Retargeting link, deep linking data, empty for SRNs.

properties.name: device_model
properties.description: The commercial model name of the device. Example: xiaomi::Redmior iPhone7

schema.name: in_app_events_report
schema.description: Raw post-install event data from AppsFlyer In-App Events Report API (v5). One row per in-app event (including revenue events). Primary source for monetization and engagement signals.

properties.name: attributed_touch_type
properties.description: Classifies the engagement. Set by AppsFlyer after the engagement was matched with an install.

properties.name: attributed_touch_time
properties.description: UA: time of the touch we attributed to. Retargeting: time of the engagement we attributed to.

properties.name: install_time
properties.description: UA: First launch after install. Retargeting: First launch after re-engagement/re-attribution

properties.name: event_time
properties.description: Time the event occurred

properties.name: event_name
properties.description: The attribution event type or the in-app event name sent by the app. Example attribution event types: install, re-engagement, and so on.

properties.name: event_value
properties.description: Detailed event content sent from the SDK. Note: Don't send more than 1000 characters; they can be truncated.

properties.name: event_revenue
properties.description: Value of revenue using Event Revenue Currency. Amounts outside of the range $-1,000,000- $+1,000,000 (or equivalent) appear in raw data reports but not aggregate reports.

properties.name: event_revenue_currency
properties.description: The event revenue currency code reported to the SDK.

properties.name: event_revenue_usd
properties.description: The amount of revenue. The currency will depend on the reporting tool used. Preferred or selected means the app-specific currency set in the app settings. Data Locker: always USD. Export page: selected currency. Pull API selectable: USD or selected using &currency=preferred. Push API: always contains both fields, USD and selected currency

properties.name: event_source
properties.description: Either SDK or S2S

properties.name: is_receipt_validated
properties.description: TRUE/FALSE/NULL when implemented in the SDK, empty otherwise

properties.name: af_prt
properties.description: Agency identifier. For SKAN, may not be populated

properties.name: media_source
properties.description: The media source attributed to an event or restricted

properties.name: af_channel
properties.description: Media source channel. Example: YouTube for Google, Instagram for Meta ads

properties.name: keywords
properties.description: Word(s) used in the user's online search. As reported by the ad network

properties.name: af_c_id
properties.description: Campaign ID

properties.name: af_adset
properties.description: Adset name, identifies a group that contains one or more ads

properties.name: af_adset_id
properties.description: Adset ID, identifies a group that contains one or more ads

properties.name: af_ad
properties.description: Ad name

properties.name: af_ad_id
properties.description: Ad ID

properties.name: af_ad_type
properties.description: Example: banner, footer

properties.name: af_siteid
properties.description: Publisher ID

properties.name: af_sub_siteid
properties.description: Sub-publisher ID

properties.name: af_cost_model
properties.description: Cost model reported on the attribution link. CPC/CPI/CPM/Other. Currently, all cost is calculated according to CPI regardless of this value

properties.name: af_cost_value
properties.description: Amount of Cost Currency. 4 digits after the decimal point permitted. Example: 320.5095

properties.name: af_cost_currency
properties.description: 3-letter currency code (USD, EUR) that complies with ISO-4217. Default is USD.

properties.name: contributor1_af_prt
properties.description: Agency or PMD - always converted to lowercase

properties.name: contributor1_media_source
properties.description: Contributor media source

properties.name: contributor1_campaign
properties.description: Contributor campaign

properties.name: contributor1_touch_type
properties.description: Possible values: click, impression

properties.name: contributor1_touch_time
properties.description: Contributor touch time

properties.description: Agency or PMD - always converted to lowercase

properties.name: contributor2_media_source
properties.description: Contributor media source

properties.name: contributor2_campaign
properties.description: Contributor campaign

properties.name: contributor2_touch_type
properties.description: Possible values: click, impression

properties.name: contributor2_touch_time
properties.description: Contributor touch time

properties.name: contributor3_af_prt
properties.description: Agency or PMD - always converted to lowercase

properties.name: contributor3_media_source
properties.description: Contributor media source

properties.name: contributor3_campaign
properties.description: Contributor campaign

properties.name: contributor3_touch_type
properties.description: Possible values: click, impression

properties.name: contributor3_touch_time
properties.description: Contributor touch time
